title: Ski Japan at the Okushiga Kogen Hotel, Yamanouchi
description: Experience the famous powder of Japan and hit the slopes of Asia's largest interlinked ski area, Shiga Kogen, Yamanouchi, staying at the ski-in, ski-out Okushiga Kogen Hotel. Enjoy five nights in a Standard Room overlooking the mountains, with daily breakfast, two dining experiences and ski rental for two adults.
location_description: Okushiga Kogen Hotel [214892] Ski Japan at the Okushiga Kogen Hotel, Yamanouchi
offer_address: Japan, 〒381-0405 Nagano Prefecture, Shimotakai District, Yamanouchi, 奥志賀高原 Yamanouchi,
